Intro_Car_Driving: ^It has been one year since the accident. One endlessly long year looking for the truth.
^You know your child is alive. All the answers are out there.

s0: ^You finally arrive at the location you've been given.

Intro_Car_Parked: ^Better keep a low profile and go trough the woods

c-0:
^You shudder at what you had to do to obtain this adress.

^No way you're backing out now

Intro_Forest: ^Ominous twisted trees watch you venture deeper into the woods

c-1: ^You continue until you reach the house.
c-2: ^Everything look so quiet here. you shiver

Intro_Portail: ^The property is closed off by a large gate.
^It is too high to climb over.

c-1: ^It is locked by an old rusty chain.
^It has seen betters days, maybe there's a way to break it.
c-2: ^You put all your weight on the bar. The chain finally surrenders.
^The gate opens with a creaking noise, you enter the front yard.
c-3: ^Among the rusty tools lies a big iron bar.
^This may be useful to break the chain.
c-4: ^Not very subtle but you need to get in there.

Exterior_Front: ^This mansion, once opulent, looks rather abandonned
^A towering statue seem to watch over the proprety

s0: ^You knock repeatedly to the door but no one answers.

c-0: ^Maybe you can find another way in.
c-1:
^Strange spindly dark silouhettes.

^They represent a familly but their alien look gives you chills.

Exterior_Right: ^The way to the back is blocked by a large empty ditch. It's not dry enough to cross.

b: ^You caught something moving on the first floor.

c-1: ^You can distinguish a ghostly figure through the window.
^You call out to it but it suddenly fades away.
c-2: ^The strange figure has vanished. Did it really happen?
c-3:
^Crossing the ditch does not seem like a good idea.

^There must be a better way around the house.

b: ^You walk along an overgrown french garden.

Exterior_Left: ^There is a shed on the left.
Exterior_Shed: ^A thick layer of dust covers everything. Nothing has been touched in a long time.

c-1:
^Warped wood planks and broken windows.

^Nothing useful in there.
c-2: ^A ladder rests to the bench side.
^It could be useful to enter the house.
c-3: ^Hopefully you won't have to carry it around for too long.

Exterior_Back: ^A tiled terrace  is nested at the back of the house.

c-1: ^The shutters are not fully closed and the window behind seems opened.
^If you had a way to get up there, you could sneak inside.
c-2: ^You put the ladder against the wall.
^It is tall enough to reach the window.
c-3: ^You climb the ladder and enter the house.

Hall_TopDown: ^As you enter, you see someone rushing through the door just below you.

s0: ^You really hope it don't know how to open doors.
^The man has disappeared through the door.

c-0: ^The door is locked from the other side.
c-2: ^The creature is surely still lurking behind. There is no way you are going back there.
c-3: ^You grasp the handle. The door seem to weep as you push it open.
c-4: ^You throw yourself at the door in vain. You notice a small device besides it.
c-5: ^The result of using the scanners is a bit messy but it worked.
c-6: ^You may find some leads on the first floor.

Hall_Scanner: ^This kind of technology feels out of place here.

b:
^The eye is not enough to operate the device.

^You also need a fingerprint.

^It seems like some sort of biometric device.

^Apparently it needs to scan your eye and your finger.

c-2: ^You press both eye and finger onto the scanner.
^You squish them hard and you eventually get a reading.

b: ^What a stark constrast. The persian carpet on the floor feels rather nice but the ceiling however is falling off.

c-1:
^The door is locked from the other side. You hear humming coming from the room.

^You knock on the door but no one answers.
c-3:
^The creature came from here.

^You would rather not know what is inside.
c-4: ^There is no way you are going back there.

c-3: ^It seems to have been used recently.
c-4: ^It falls on the ground. Bad omen.

b: ^You are not going back in there.

c-1: ^The bottom of the tub is filled caked goo. Gross.

Eye_Syringe: ^As you try to repress a heave, you start to seriously question this place.

c-2: ^As gross as touching this eye is, it may work on the door scanner.
^As you take the eye, you hear a loud tumbling noise coming from the bedroom behind.

b: ^You are not going back in there.

Eye_Blob: ^What is that thing?! The stench emanating from it makes you retch.

c-0: ^You get a closer look and notice its surface is slowly pulsing. Oh Lord!
^Something is spurting from one of its pores.
c-1: ^You step closer to the creature, trying to control your nausea.
c-2:
^It is growing and moving in your direction.

^You need to act fast
c-3:
^It came from the corridor.

^Going back this way is out of question.

b: ^You rush to the bathroom, hoping it won't follow you there.

Dead: ^You feel a warm wet touch clenching you arm. You are violently pulled backward.
^you grasp for air but a hot sticky liquid fills your lungs.

Eye_Blob_Key: ^You realise it was a key emerging from the goo.

c-0: ^Trying not to touch the flesh, you grab the key with the tip of your fingers.
^You hear a very loud noise. It's waking up.

Eye_Attic: ^You lock the door behind you, hoping that it will keep the hideous thing away.

c-0: ^What you discover doesn't make you very hopeful.
^Skin has shrunk around the skinny bones. It's practically mummified
c-1:
^The occupant was counting days.

^And many days have passed apprently.
c-2: ^You kick the bare planks hard, enventually falling through.

b: ^The smell makes your guts inside out.
^He is dead. What kind of monster could have done that?
^The poor kid. You have to do something about it.

c-1: ^You slowly approach your hand and pull the curtain open.
c-2: ^You try to help the poor child, but you arrived too late.
^Who could have done that. Are there any clues on the body ?

Kid_Player: ^Your attention is caught by a toy tape player.

c-2: ^You insert the tape in the player and press play.

s0: ^You fall hard into and unknown room.

Finger_Bottom: ^The small lounge seems to lead up to a steep staircase.

c-0: ^You notice the lock on the door was on.
^You unlock it and open the door.
c-2:
^That's where you came from.

^Let's hope the thing won't follow you.

s0: ^You cautiously start to climb. It's pretty steep

Finger_Stairs_Up: ^The stairs leads up to the first floor.
Finger_Stairs_Down: ^The stairs leads back to the lounge.
Finger_Corridor_Up: ^You try to be quiet but the flooring is squeaky.

s0: ^You slowly push the door and enter the room.
^The corridor turns and opens up into a larger room.

Finger_Bedroom_Far: ^It looks like a bedroom but the main furniture are gone.

c-1:
^And odd collection of mismatched books and artefact.

^You pick one but can't decipher the language

b: ^A wooden sliding door. A beautiful mural is painted on it.

c-1: ^It's a large sea shell with fragrant beads inside.
c-2: ^The door seems loosely locked from the other side. You can distinguish the silouhette of a simple latch between the two doors.
^you could probably push it up with a thin object.
c-3: ^You insert the card between the two doors.
^You gently push the latch up and slide open the door.
^You're immediatly seized by a strong acrid smell.
c-4: ^The memory of the creature flash before your eyes but you have to press on.

c-1: ^In the reflection, you see something lying in the tub.
c-2: ^You gather your mental strength and slowly peak at the tub.

Finger_Tub: ^Someone is lying inside the tub, lifeless.
^Little bits of mold are floating in the placid blood

c-1:
^Why did she do that?

^What is happening here?
c-2: ^What are you going to do with those scissors?
^You can't believe that you are thinking about this.
^This house starts to weight on you.

Finger_Hand: ^The hand of the woman is hanging from the side of the tub.
^Despite bright red painted nails, the bloated skin is dark and reminds you of the creature.

c-1: ^If this hand belongs to the owner, it may work on the electronic lock.
^If only you had some way to take it with you.
c-2: ^The horror of the situations is numbing.
^The blade cuts through the flesh easily.
^It feels like there wasn't any solid bones.

Finger_Tub_Chase: ^You almost scream as the hand retracts and body disappears inside the tub.

c-2: ^You can't see anything through the crimson water
^Ripples sudently appear and a tentacle emerges from the tub.
c-3: ^Your eyes widen in horror? You need to get out of here fast.

Blob_03: ^Another tentacle burst out of the dark mass and swinging erratically. You dodged this one but may not be so lucky next time.

c-1: ^This keeps coming out, how is this possible ?

Blob_03: ^The large one is getting dangerously close
Dead: ^Unable to move as tremors seize you, you feel the cold touch of a tentacle wrapping around your head.
^The burst of pain knocks unconsious. Lucky for you, you won't hear the sound of your every bones crushing.

c-0: ^You face back and start to run.

Dead: ^A large tentacly violentely know you against the wall.
^Head bleeding, unable to move the dark mass quickly overrun your body and crush you.

c-0: ^There is no way you are going back there.
c-1: ^Out of breath, you rush down the stairs.

Blob_03: ^You feel some trying to grasp at your arm
Dead: ^A bright flash of light blinds you as your neck snaps under the grip of the monster.

Finger_Stairs_Down_Chase: ^You throw yourself down but a tentacle grabs your feet.
^You lose balance and tumble down the stairs.

c-1: ^You get back on your feet and run to the lounge.

Blob_02: ^Tentacles are sliding bewteen the railing bars.
Dead: ^As the tentacles seized your legs, you see the body coming down, crushing you in it's way.

c-1: ^Please, make that the other one won't show up. Not now.
c-2: ^You boom inside the hall and shut the door behind you.
^You hear the creature crashing on the door. thankfully it doesn't hopen from this side.

Dead: ^Helpless, you're quickly taken by this slimy embrace
^You pray every god know to man as you feel life leaving your body.
